channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Report ref: 8274102., 21st November
item.description:
Again this light has still not been fixed after a month of it being reported. Very dark and creepy when walking in the early hours of the morning or late a night especially for girl/lady on her own.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumbrian Avenue, North End, Greater London

item.title: Curb stone sticking out into road near pavement by tree, 21st November
item.description:
In between number 59 & 61 Clive Road EN1 the tree in the pavement has pushed the curb stone out a significant amount & has caused damage to my car wheel whilst parking. This should really be fixed as its liable to cause damage to other people's cars too & will only get worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clive Road, Southbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant fly tipping, 21st November
item.description:
Hi, We have an issue with constant fly tipping on this street as it is a close and is not seen on routes Objects are left and people add to it causing on going rubbish heaps and smells This is now causing issues with parking as rubbish and debris impact driving and turning around in an already tight space Any help would be most appreciated

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bargate Close, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A compliment!, 21st November
item.description:
The street cleaner must have spent 2-3 hours clearing all the leaves from the Peckham Rd end of Dagmar Road. He worked really hard and filled at least 25 bags. We are really grateful - please thank our street cleaner for his hard work, on dark cold days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incomplete tree removal., 21st November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Handforth Road, Oval, Greater London

item.title: Kerb at side of road sticking up dangerously, 21st November
item.description:
The kerb opposite 131 Westwood Lane which is designed for blind people is currently part of it sticking up making it a trip hazard not just for them but for anyone. Also some of the stones are cracked. I did report this a little while ago and it was fixed but it looks to be very dangerous again and new slabs put in are already broken.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Lane, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree falling over, 21st November
item.description:
The stake supporting this tree has broken and the cage is falling over onto the tree. As a result the tree is also falling over and will very soon also break.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alkham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All of Holmshurst needs cleaning, 21st November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmhurst Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
